quest.name: Brick by Brick, Tank by Tank
journal:
 Quest Sync
Dossennus is looking battered and bruised after a scrape with some automated adversary.
objectives: Inspect the dormant warmachina and search for ceruleum tanks.
Deliver the ceruleum tank to Dossennus.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: What do you want? Hmm, hold on─ You seem a rather dexterous sort. Perhaps I can persuade you to take on a task for me?

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: I trust you are aware that ceruleum tanks can be salvaged from downed magitek weaponry, yes? Excellent. As it so happens, I have just finished scouting the perimeter of the station, looking for any machina that aren't yet completely destroyed.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: I thought my work done, but word has reached me that some warmachina have recently come to a grinding halt nearby. As much as I would like to investigate this report, I worry the things may not be completely out of commission─that they may have life enough left to strike a killing blow.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: If you're willing, search the area northwest of the station for dormant warmachina and pilfer their tanks of ceruleum for me. See if you can succeed where I've so egregiously failed.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: Find inactive warmachina and salvage their ceruleum tanks for me, will you? You should find some northwest of the station.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The ceruleum tank is completely empty.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You retrieve a tank containing a small amount of ceruleum.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have already tried searching this magitek.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: Why, just look at you─ Not so much as a scratch. Now then, have you the tanks I requested?

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: I knew you'd come through! Without this ceruleum, we might well have frozen to death. There may not be much, but we're grateful for it, believe me.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: Still, what we have here is but a small bandage atop a very large wound. While this amount of fuel is only a stopgap measure, its discovery means that more can likely be found farther afield.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: <sigh> ...If I am to be honest, I often find myself wishing for a savior, one who will lead us into more promising times, as Emperor Solus once did. Someone who might pluck us from this sad lot.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: But no man or woman as great as he will ever appear again─at least, not in our lifetimes. No, we've only to rely on ourselves now, to rebuild our fallen cities brick by brick, stone by stone.

dialogue.name: DOSSENNUS
dialogue.text: It will prove a grueling task, one that will take us years. Just thinking about it makes my head spin...but you've shown me that if we all pull our weight, it's not so unrealistic a goal. From the bottom of my heart, thank you for giving me the courage to go on.
